instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: BankTrans | Columns: BTID (INTEGER), AccountNo (VARCHAR(20)), TransDate (DATE), TransType (VARCHAR(10)), Amount (DECIMAL(12,2)), RefCode (VARCHAR(30))
output: The "BankTrans" table stores details of bank transactions, including a unique transaction identifier, account number, date of transaction, type of transaction, amount involved, and a reference code.

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: CardHolds | Columns: CHoldID (INTEGER), AccNum (VARCHAR(20)), HoldType (VARCHAR(40)), HoldDate (TIMESTAMP), HoldAmount (DECIMAL(12,2)))
output: The "CardHolds" table tracks credit card holds, including a unique hold identifier, account number, type of hold, timestamp, and amount held.

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: AccTrans | Columns: TransID (INTEGER), AccNumber (VARCHAR(20)), TransDate (DATE), TransType (VARCHAR(10)), Amount (DECIMAL(10,2)), Description (TEXT)
output: The "AccTrans" table stores transaction records for bank accounts, including a unique transaction ID, account number, transaction date, transaction type, amount, and a descriptive note.

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: AccStmts | Columns: ASID (INTEGER), AcctRef (INTEGER), StmtDate (DATE), StmtType (VARCHAR(30)), StmtData (BLOB)

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: AccTrans | Columns: TransID (INTEGER), AccNum (VARCHAR(20)), TransDate (DATE), TransType (VARCHAR(15)), TransAmt (DECIMAL(10,2)), PayMethod (VARCHAR(30))

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: AccTrans | Columns: TransID (INTEGER), AccNum (VARCHAR(20)), TransType (VARCHAR(10)), TransDate (DATE), Amount (DECIMAL(12,2)), RefNum (VARCHAR(15))

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.

instruction: Analyze the provided database table structure and generate a human-readable description of its purpose and contents.
input: Table name: BankAccounts | Columns: BAID (INTEGER), CustRef (INTEGER), AccType (VARCHAR(30)), OpenDate (DATE), CurBal (DECIMAL(12,2))
